```{r}

```

```{r, results='asis'}
kable(head(iris))
```


```{r}
# library(help = "randomForest")

idx_train <- sample(1:nrow(iris), 15, replace = FALSE)
tf_test <- !1:nrow(iris) %in% idx_train

feature_columns <- 1:(ncol(iris)-1)
model <- randomForest(iris[idx_train, feature_columns], y = iris[idx_train, ncol(iris)])
print(model)
```

```{r}
response <- predict(model, iris[idx_test, feature_columns])

correct <- response == iris[idx_test, ncol(iris)]

sum(correct) / length(correct)
```


Intermezzo TRUE/FALSE vectors

```{r}
tf_sepal <- with(iris, Sepal.Length > 4.5)

sum(tf_test)
sum(tf_sepal)
tf <- tf_test & tf_sepal
sum(tf)

```
